The avatar bets by stepping into colored pits (1–4), triggering a bet on the corresponding camel. Upon reaching the goal, a camel transforms into a winner sprite. The player wins if their bet matches the first camel to cross the goal. The game ends if any camel reaches the goal alone (loss), or if the player’s bet matches the first winner (win). Barriers and walls block movement.
0.digdug: The player controls an avatar with a shovel, digging through floors to collect gold and gems while avoiding monsters. Digging creates falling boulders that crush monsters and walls. Winning requires collecting all goodies (gold and gems) and eliminating all monsters. The avatar can dig through floors but not walls, which block movement and can be destroyed by shovels or falling boulders.

The avatar can only pass through doors when the key missile is present. Collecting gems and the exit yields points.
